error.signature: Could not find a declaration file for module 'package-name'. 'path/index.js' implicitly has an 'any' type.
error.regex: Could not find a declaration file for module.*implicitly has an 'any' type

verdict.summary: The package exists but has no TypeScript declarations. Install @types/ package or create a declaration file.

dead_ends.action: Set noImplicitAny to false in tsconfig.json
dead_ends.why_fails: Disables a core type safety check across the entire project, not just the problematic module

workarounds.action: Install the @types/ package for the library
Create a minimal declaration file for the module

leads_to.condition: After adding types, type mismatches surface

preceded_by.condition: When module is found but declarations are missing

frequently_confused_with.distinction: TS2307 means module cannot be found at all; this error means module exists but lacks type declarations
